mapper.select: SELECT tb_user.`username`, tb_order_comment.`content`,tb_order_comment.`time`, tb_user.`user_pic` FROM tb_order_comment,tb_order_detail,tb_room,tb_user WHERE tb_order_comment.`order_id` = tb_order_detail.`order_id` AND tb_order_detail.`room_id` = #{roomId} AND tb_room.`room_id` = #{roomId} AND tb_user.`user_id` = tb_order_comment.`user_id`
